label: 寄郡
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: (or yori-gōri) Mixed public and private lands: I.e. areas owing taxes to the regular provincial agencies as well as to a shōen headquarters. The term yose-gōri (though not certain variations of the practice) was limited to southern Kyushu.
